news.title: Storm Floris clear-up under way after power cuts and travel disruption
news.summary: SSEN said it was continuing to restore supplies after about 50,000 homes were left without power.

news.title: Â£100m of premium bond prizes remain unclaimed
news.summary: Critics want the system used to trace accounts to be reformed so people do not miss out on prizes.

news.title: Pupils across Scotland to receive exam results
news.summary: Certificates will be delivered by first-class post, though many students will also receive a text or email.

news.title: Countries try to thrash out deal on 'plastic crisis' at UN conference
news.summary: The world's nations are hoping to sign the first global plastic treaty to limit plastic pollution.

news.title: Why Donald Trump is talking about actress Sydney Sweeney
news.summary: The actress stars in a controversial American Eagle advert that has become a political flashpoint in the US.

news.title: The Papers: Farage 'fanning the flames' and England's 'one-armed warrior'
news.summary: Tuesday's papers feature an immigration row and India's test cricket win over England.

news.title: Remains of extinct Bronze Age cattle found in cave
news.summary: Archaeologists and cave explorers found the remains among Ingleborough's caves and sinkholes.

news.title: US condemns house arrest of Brazil's ex-president Jair Bolsonaro
news.summary: US State Department responded to Brazil's supreme court order saying Bolsonaro allegedly breached a ban on using social media.

news.title: Convicted rapist fighting to remain in parliament in Australia
news.summary: The New South Wales parliament wants to expel Gareth Ward after he was last month found guilty of rape.

news.title: 'Winning the Ashes would be Stokes' greatest miracle'
news.summary: Winning the Ashes for England in Australia this winter would be Ben Stokes' greatest miracle, says chief cricket reporter Stephan Shemilt.
